attributes.action: do everything in his power to ensure that various forms of the media also play THEIR part in combatting climate change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I accept that I have to do what I can about climate change but it would be helpful, and probably persuade more people also to do what THEY can, if the media were not shown to be completely ignoring the issue by (for example): showing programmes such as Top Gear, motor racing (e.g. F1), etc which consume vast amounts of petrol to no purpose; or sports matches after dark thereby obviously needing floodlighting.  I can't think of any other examples off-hand but I imagine these show the way I'm thinking.
